players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I believe we should focus on finding the mafia among us. Given what happened last night, I think it's crucial that we work together to identify and eliminate them."

You: "I will continue to work with the group, but I have a feeling about Diana. She seems too confident and doesn't seem concerned about the mafia."
